summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2536, for the improvement of West 69th Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest to the west line of Holman Addition to the City of Seattle; all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 29424 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
